hanzi-su-wiki:
郎

Значения

Мужчина

Мнемоника

Город ⻏, где имеется зерно 良 для еды. Сейчас имеет значение «старший сын» и используется в мужских именах.

Варианты

郞
purpleculture_pinyin:
láng
surname Lang; (arch.) minister; official; noun prefix denoting function or status; a youth
фамилия Ланг; (арх.) министр; официальный; префикс существительного, обозначающий функцию или статус; молодость
rtega_mnemonic:
郎郎RS郒郞𨝥gentleman, young man, master, husband
  • master with his attributes: → 郎
  • a good 良 subservient person 阝
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A man from a good 良 place 阝; 良 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
新郎 [ xīn láng ]: bridegroom; groom
法郎 [ fǎ láng ]: franc; Classifiers: 个
郎中 [ láng zhōng ]: doctor (Chinese medicine); ancient official title; companions (respectful)
郎君 [ láng jūn ]: my husband and master (archaic); playboy of rich family; pimp
二郎腿 [ èr láng tuǐ ]: one leg over the other (legs crossed)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 良 [ liáng ] good, virtuous, respectable
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
heisig_chinese_memo: The daughter is a halo (good) girl that grows up to be a woman. The son is a halo of a young man that grows up to defend the city walls.
heisig_constituent: son, halo, good, drop, silver, city walls
koohiiStory1: The daughter is a good girl that grows up to be a woman. The son is a good boy that grows up to defend the city walls.
koohiiStory2: A good son stays within the city walls so he can care for his parents…　RTK2:　ロウ　新郎　しんろう(bridegroom)…　Pure Group:　廊1852.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Inside the "Good Building" there's a single guy.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel free to walk around the Good Building. There are no things or people, except for that one guy. Who is that guy.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You talk to that guy. The only thing he does is offer you roe (ろう).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You try to talk to the guy, poke him, and even yell at him. But, all he does is hand you some fish roe. When you take it, he offers you more fish roe. What's up with this guy?
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 狼 (おおかみ、ロウ волк), 浪 (ロウ бродить).
Ru_trainchinese:
làng: (графема) используется только в слове 屎壳郎
láng: (сущ) обращение женщины к своему мужу, мой дорогой
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a good (良) group (⻏) includes a husband
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The daughter is a halo (good) girl that grows up to be a woman. The son is a halo of a young man that grows up to defend the city walls.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " yi " to " good " sound. " Lang " is the place name of Lu in the Spring and Autumn Period. "Said Wen": "Lang, Lu Ting also. Congyi, good sound." "Yu Pian. "Yi Department": "Lang, Lu Yi." At that time, two places in Shandong were called " Lang ". One was in the suburbs of Lu, near Qufu City in Shandong Province. "Book of Rites. "Tan Gong Xia": "Fight against Lang." Zheng Xuan's note: "Lang, Lu Jinyi also. "The Eleventh Year of Amour" "Qi Kingdom Shushu Shuaishi cut me" is also." One is Yuanyi, in Yutai County, Shandong northeast. "Zuo Zhuan. Yin A.Y.": "Xia April, Faber took charge of Cheng Lang." Du's note: "Lang, Lu Yi. There is Yulang Pavilion in Gaoping and the southeast of the county."

" Lang " is also the official name, which is the collective term for the servants on the left and the right of the monarch, such as the Langzhong, Shi Lang, and Langzhong Ling. Such as "Han Feizi. "Foreign Reserve said upper left": "It is the day, but the doctor is not dressed in purple; it is the moon, and the middle is not dressed in purple; it is the year, and the inside is not dressed in purple." On the List of the Hundred Officials": "Lang is in charge of the door, and there are cars and rides. There are Yi Lang, Zhong Lang, Shi Lang, and Lang Zhong, all without staff, as many as a thousand people."

" Lang " is an extension of a good name for ancient men. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wu Shu. "Zhou Yu Biography": "When Yu was twenty-four years old, Wu Zhong was called Zhou Lang." "Shi Shuo Xin Yu. Yaliang": "Wang family's lords are also commendable. They can hear them, and they are salty and reserved. Only Yuichiro lies on the east bed, if he does not smell."

" Lang " also specifically refers to a woman's name for her husband or lover. Such as "The Jade Terrace." Jiang Yan's "Xizhou Song": "Recalling Lang and Lang will not come, looking up at Feihong." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Chang Gan Xing": "Lang rides a bamboo horse to get green plums around the bed."

In ancient times, young women were also called "girls." Such as "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Cross-blown tunes five. "Mulan Poem": "Twelve years of walking together, I don't know that Mulan is a girl." Qin Guan of the Northern Song Dynasty (Nine Poems of Qiu Xing. Li Bai>: "Mall ducks live in grass, and the lotus-picking girl smiles and grows old."

" Lang " can represent the title of an ancient slave to his master. For example, the Bai Xing Jian of the Tang Dynasty "Li Wa Biography": "There is an old vertical, that is, the mother will give birth to the breast. When he sees the act of life, he will resign, but he will not dare to recognize it, but he will run out of tears. The father was shocked and questioned, because he told: "The appearance of the singer resembles Lang's dead son." "New Tang Book. "Song Jing Biography": "Zheng Shanguo said that Jing said: "What does Gong Nai mean that Wu Lang is the Qing?" Jing said: "The official is the rightful official. The monarch is not his slave, who is the cloud?""

" Lang " is also the ancient term for those engaged in certain occupations, such as fisherman, trader, cowboy, etc. For example, Guan Hanqing of Yuan Dynasty "Wang Runxiang Night Moon Four Spring Garden. The third fold": "I am a merchandiser, and when I come to this market, I shake my head to see if someone is coming." Tang Xianzu of the Ming Dynasty "Peony Pavilion. "Su Yuan": "Call Hua Lang, clear the flower path."

The ancients called other people's sons "Linglangjun", and later referred to as "Linglang". Such as "The Jade Terrace." The Anonymous "Ancient Poem for Jiao Zhongqing's Wife": "The poor and lowly have this daughter, and they are suitable for returning home. Unbearable officials and wives, how can they match the prince." Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty "Yu Shi Ming Yan. "Teng Da Yin Ghost Broken Furniture": "The old man has been in his senior years, and he has added a new young man, which shows that the blood is not declining, and it is a sign of longevity."
humanum_short_description_en: From " yi " to " good " sound. " Lang " is the place name of Lu in the Spring and Autumn Period.
humanum_full_description:
從「邑」，「良」聲。「郎」是春秋時魯國的地名。《說文》：「郎，魯亭也。从邑，良聲。」《玉篇．邑部》：「郎，魯邑。」當時魯國有兩個地方稱為「郎」，一在魯國近郊之邑，在今山東省曲阜市附近。《禮記．檀弓下》：「戰于郎。」鄭玄注：「郎，魯近邑也。〈哀十一年〉『齊國書帥師伐我』是也。」一為遠邑，在今山東魚台縣東北。《左傳．隱公元年》：「夏四月，費伯帥師城郎。」杜預注：「郎，魯邑。高平方與縣東南有郁郎亭。」

　　「郎」也是官名，乃君主左右侍從官的統稱，如郎中、侍郎、郎中令等。如《韓非子．外儲說左上》：「是日也，郎中莫衣紫；是月也，國中莫衣紫；是歲也，境內莫衣紫。」《漢書．百官公卿表上》：「郎掌守門戶，出充車騎，有議郎、中郎、侍郎、郎中，皆無員，多至千人。」

　　「郎」引申表示古代男子的美稱。如《三國志．吳書．周瑜傳》：「瑜時年二十四，吳中皆呼為周郎。」《世說新語．雅量》：「王家諸郎，亦皆可嘉，聞來覓壻，咸自矜持。唯有一郎，在東床上坦腹臥，如不聞。」

　　「郎」也特指婦女對丈夫或情人的稱呼。如《玉臺新詠．江淹〈西洲曲〉》：「憶郎郎不至，仰首望飛鴻。」唐代李白〈長幹行〉：「郎騎竹馬來，繞床弄青梅。」

　　古代亦稱年輕女子為「女郎」。如《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭五．木蘭詩》：「同行十二年，不知木蘭是女郎。」北宋秦觀〈秋興九首．擬李白〉：「綠頭鴨兒棲萍草，採蓮女郎笑花老。」

　　「郎」可表示古代奴僕對主人的稱呼。如唐代白行簡〈李娃傳〉：「有老豎，即生乳母壻也，見生之舉措辭氣，將認之而未敢，乃泫然流涕。生父驚而詰之，因告曰：『歌者之貌，酷似郎之亡子。』」《新唐書．宋璟傳》：「鄭善果謂璟曰：『公奈何謂五郎為卿？』璟曰：『以官正當為卿。君非其家奴，何郎之云？』」

　　「郎」還是古代對從事某種職業者的稱呼，例如漁郎、貨郎、牛郎等。如元代關漢卿《王閏香夜月四春園．第三折》：「自家是個貨郎兒，來到這街市上，我搖動不郎鼓兒，看有是麼人來。」明代湯顯祖《牡丹亭．肅苑》：「預喚花郎，掃清花徑。」

　　古人稱別人的兒子為「令郎君」，後省作「令郎」。如《玉臺新詠．無名氏〈古詩為焦仲卿妻作〉》：「貧賤有此女，始適還家門。不堪吏人婦，豈合令郎君。」明代馮夢龍《喻世明言．滕大尹鬼斷家私》：「老先生高年，又新添個小令郎，足見血氣不衰，乃上壽之徵也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「邑」，「良」聲。「郎」是春秋時魯國的地名。

English Definition: surname Lang; (arch.) minister; official; noun prefix denoting function or status; a youth

Ideographic: A man from a good 良 place 阝; 良 also provides the pronunciation

    • 良 [ liáng ] good, virtuous, respectable
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city

法郎 [ fǎ láng ]: franc; Classifiers: 个

郎君 [ láng jūn ]: my husband and master (archaic); playboy of rich family; pimp
二郎腿 [ èr láng tuǐ ]: one leg over the other (legs crossed)

Original meaning 本义: Meaning husband.

English senses 英语理解: gentleman, young man; husband

Compound 郎 older 郞𨝥郒 from right-city 阝邑 yì and phonetic building-pavilion 良良𣌩 liáng.

lang2
HSK 6: 郎,狼,廊
郎郎RS 郒 郞 𨝥 gentleman, young man, master, husband
  • master with his attributes: → 郎
  • a good 良 subservient person 阝
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A man from a good 良 place 阝; 良 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 良 [ liáng ] good, virtuous, respectable
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
①对年轻男子的称呼：大郎。郎才女貌。
②对某种人的称呼：货郎。女郎。
③旧时妻称夫或情人：郎君。
④封建时代的官名：郎中(ａ．古官名；b．中医医生)。侍郎。员外郎。
⑤姓氏。
郎中 [ láng zhōng ]: doctor (Chinese medicine); ancient official title; companions (respectful)
郎君 [ láng jūn ]: my husband and master (archaic); playboy of rich family; pimp
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A man from a good 良 place 阝; 良 also provides the pronunciation
HSK: 6
Freq: 1457
Kanshudo mnemonic:a good (良) group (⻏) includes a husband
On-Yomi: ロウ、リョウ
Kun-Yomi: おとこ
Heisig constituents: son, halo, good, drop, silver, city walls
Heisig: Halo . . . city walls.
Chinese: The daughter is a halo (good) girl that grows up to be a woman. The son is a halo of a young man that grows up to defend the city walls.
koohii1: The daughter is a good girl that grows up to be a woman. The son is a good boy that grows up to defend the city walls.

Meaning: young man
Story: The daughter is a halo (good) girl that grows up to be a woman. The son is a halo of a young man that grows up to defend the city walls.
Kind: both

從「 邑 」，「 良 」聲。「 郎 」是春秋時魯國的地名。《說文》：「郎，魯亭也。从邑，良聲。」《玉篇．邑部》：「郎，魯邑。」當時魯國有兩個地方稱為「 郎 」，一在魯國近郊之邑，在今山東省曲阜市附近。《禮記．檀弓下》：「戰于郎。」鄭玄注：「郎，魯近邑也。〈哀十一年〉『齊國書帥師伐我』是也。」一為遠邑，在今山東魚台縣東北。《左傳．隱公元年》：「夏四月，費伯帥師城郎。」杜預注：「郎，魯邑。高平方與縣東南有郁郎亭。」 「 郎 」也是官名，乃君主左右侍從官的統稱，如郎中、侍郎、郎中令等。如《韓非子．外儲說左上》：「是日也，郎中莫衣紫；是月也，國中莫衣紫；是歲也，境內莫衣紫。」《漢書．百官公卿表上》：「郎掌守門戶，出充車騎，有議郎、中郎、侍郎、郎中，皆無員，多至千人。」 「 郎 」引申表示古代男子的美稱。如《三國志．吳書．周瑜傳》：「瑜時年二十四，吳中皆呼為周郎。」《世說新語．雅量》：「王家諸郎，亦皆可嘉，聞來覓壻，咸自矜持。唯有一郎，在東床上坦腹臥，如不聞。」 「 郎 」也特指婦女對丈夫或情人的稱呼。如《玉臺新詠．江淹〈西洲曲〉》：「憶郎郎不至，仰首望飛鴻。」唐代李白〈長幹行〉：「郎騎竹馬來，繞床弄青梅。」 古代亦稱年輕女子為「女郎」。如《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭五．木蘭詩》：「同行十二年，不知木蘭是女郎。」北宋秦觀〈秋興九首．擬李白〉：「綠頭鴨兒棲萍草，採蓮女郎笑花老。」 「 郎 」可表示古代奴僕對主人的稱呼。如唐代白行簡〈李娃傳〉：「有老豎，即生乳母壻也，見生之舉措辭氣，將認之而未敢，乃泫然流涕。生父驚而詰之，因告曰：『歌者之貌，酷似郎之亡子。』」《新唐書．宋璟傳》：「鄭善果謂璟曰：『公奈何謂五郎為卿？』璟曰：『以官正當為卿。君非其家奴，何郎之云？』」 「 郎 」還是古代對從事某種職業者的稱呼，例如漁郎、貨郎、牛郎等。如元代關漢卿《王閏香夜月四春園．第三折》：「自家是個貨郎兒，來到這街市上，我搖動不郎鼓兒，看有是麼人來。」明代湯顯祖《牡丹亭．肅苑》：「預喚花郎，掃清花徑。」 古人稱別人的兒子為「令郎君」，後省作「令郎」。如《玉臺新詠．無名氏〈古詩為焦仲卿妻作〉》：「貧賤有此女，始適還家門。不堪吏人婦，豈合令郎君。」明代馮夢龍《喻世明言．滕大尹鬼斷家私》：「老先生高年，又新添個小令郎，足見血氣不衰，乃上壽之徵也。」

"Teng Da Yin Ghost Broken Furniture": "The old man has been in his senior years, and he has added a new young man, which shows that the blood is not declining, and it is a sign of longevity."

郎字的基本解释

郎
láng
对年轻男子的称呼：大郎。郎才女貌。
对某种人的称呼：货郎。女郎。
旧时妻称夫或情人：郎君。
封建时代的官名：郎中（ａ．古官名；ｂ．中医医生）。侍郎。员外郎。

郎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［láng］
［《廣韻》魯當切，平唐，來。］
亦作“郒1”。“郞1”的新字形。
(1)官名。战国时已有，秦汉时沿置，有议郎、中郎、侍郎、郎中等，员额无定。均属于郎中令（后改为光禄勋）。其职责原为护卫陪从，随时建议、备顾问及差遣。东汉以尚书台为实际的行政中枢，其分曹任事者为尚书郎，职责范围与过去的郎官不同。后遂以侍郎、郎中、员外郎为各部要职。
(2)青少年男子的通称。
(3)对他人之子的敬称。
(4)女婿。
(5)旧时妇女对丈夫或情人的称呼。
(6)对男子的敬称。
(7)偶亦用作自称。
(8)旧时奴仆对主人的称呼。
(9)北朝人子呼其父称郎。
(10)明时称微贱者。
(11)称僧。
(12)明清时苗族称兵士。
(13)副词。犹很，非常。
(14)通“廊”。参见“郎臺”。
(15)春秋鲁地名。㈠鲁边邑。故地在今山东省鱼台县东北。《左传·隐公元年》：“夏四月，費伯帥帥城郎。”杜预注：“郎，魯邑。高平方與縣東南有郁郎亭。”㈡春秋鲁地名。鲁近邑。故地在今山东省曲阜市附近。《礼记·檀弓下》：

Lang
Basic explanation of words
Lang
láng
The name for the young man: Da Lang. Lang Cai female appearance.
The name given to a certain person: shopkeeper. Girl.
The old wife called husband or lover: Lang Jun.
Official name in the feudal era: Langzhong (a. Ancient official name; b. Chinese medicine doctor). The servant. Yuanwailang.
name.
Lang
làng
[Shit Shell Lang] Common name for "dung beetle".
Lang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［láng］
["Guangyun" Lu Dangqie, Ping Tang, come. ]
Also known as "Yu 1". The new glyph of "Yun 1".
(1) Official name. During the Warring States period, it was established during the Qin and Han Dynasties. There were Yilang, Zhonglang, Shilang, Lang and so on, and the number of posts was not fixed. All belonged to the Langzhong Order (later changed to Guangluxun). Originally, his duty was to escort and accompany him, making recommendations, preparing consultants and dispatching at any time. The Eastern Han Dynasty took Shangshutai as the actual administrative center, and its subordinates were Shangshulang, whose scope of responsibility was different from that of the former Langguan. Later, the ministers, doctors, and Yuanwailang were appointed as important positions in the various ministries.
(2) Generic term for young men.
(3) The honorific title for the son of others.
(4) Son-in-law.
(5) The old women's name for husband or lover.
(6) Honorific title for men.
(7) Occasionally also used as self-proclaimed.
(8) The old slave's address to the master.
(9) The sons of the Northern Dynasties called their fathers Lang.
(10) Those who are called humble in the future.
(11) Said monk.
(12) During the Ming and Qing Dynasties, the Miao people were called soldiers.
(13) Adverbs. Still very, very.
(14) Through the "corridor". See "Lang Tai".
(15) Spring and Autumn Lu place names. (1) Lubian town. The old place was in the northeast of Yutai County, Shandong Province. "Zuo Zhuan·Yin AD": "Xia April, Faber handsome and handsome Cheng Lang." Du pre-annotated: "Lang, Lu Yi. There is Yulang Pavilion in Gaoping and the southeast of the county." (ii) Spring and Autumn Lu place name. Lu Jinyi. The old place was near Qufu City, Shandong Province. "Book of Rites: Under the Tan Gong":

Name meaning

形声字。从邑(B),篆书形体像人和居住区,表示和地方有关;良(lidng )声,良是廊的初文,指宫殿廷廊,侍卫人员多守候
在廷廊,故郎也用作帝王侍从官的通称。郎本是春秋时鲁国的一
处地名,又用作帝王侍从官的通称。汉魏以后称青年男子为郎。

器郎郎
郎
隶
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Congyi (B), сценарий печати выглядит как человек и жилой район, что указывает на то, что это связано с местом; звук лян (lidng), лян - это первый текст галереи, относящийся к галерее дворца, Охрана в основном ждет в придворной галерее, и старик также используется как общее имя слуги императора.
Лангбен было названием места в Королевстве Лу в период Весны и Осени, а также использовалось как общий термин для слуг императора.
После династий Хань и Вэй юношу звали Ланг.
①Древнее официальное имя: ~ чжун "официант ~" за пределами штата ~. ②Имя человека: товар ~ "корова ~. 3 Женщины звали мужа или любовника: ~ цзюнь" любовь ~. ④Звали молодых мужчин и женщин: женщина ~ "новый ~ "~ Внешний вид талантливой девушки. 5 относится к сыну: Да ~" Лин ~. ⑥ Фамилия. ~ Данг ~ Дядя ~ Цзян ~ Цай Джинню ~ Чжи Ню Е ~ высокомерный

láng
I сущ.
1) мужчина, молодой человек (также в обращении)
放牛郎 пастух
周郎 г. Чжоу!
2) вежл. сударь, господин (напр. слуга к хозяину); муженёк (жена ласково о муже)
送郎参军 провожать муженька в армию
3) ист. чиновник (вообще); лан (придворный чин; при дин. Мин - Цин; чиновник от VI класса и ниже)
郎选 отбор на должность лана (дин. Хань)
II собств.
1) ист., геогр. Лан (местность на территории нынешней пров. Шаньдун)
2) Лан (фамилия)
Radicals: 良, 阝  (good, building)
Meaning Mnemonic
Inside the "Good Building" there's a single guy.
Feel free to walk around the Good Building. There are no things or people, except for that one guy. Who is that guy.
Reading Mnemonic
You talk to that guy. The only thing he does is offer you roe (ろう).
You try to talk to the guy, poke him, and even yell at him. But, all he does is hand you some fish roe. When you take it, he offers you more fish roe. What's up with this guy?
